about_the_game:
This is the Demo for "It Is A Good Knight To Die!"


Features:
10-20 minutes of fast paced gameplay
Clever dialogue and an unwanted companion that just won't leave you alone.
Multiple enemy types to keep you guessing
2 Big stompy bosses that want to smash you into oblivion
And a glory bound knight, set on defeating his nemesis!


- Controllers supported!

name: It Is A Good Knight To Die Demo
short_description: Fight your way through hordes of evil in this light-hearted 2D, action-platformer. Traverse and battle your way through deep caves, werewolf filled forests, frigid peaks, and big stompy bosses! Always remember, It Is A Good Knight To Die!
